scripts.deploy:native: docker run --rm -v $HOME/.aws:/root/.aws -v $PWD:/app -v /app/node_modules/ -w /app -e NODE_ENV=development node:8.10 /bin/bash -c "cd /app && npm i && NODE_ENV=production $(npm bin)/sls deploy"
scripts.docker-tag: docker tag task1:latest $(node -e "console.log('`aws sts get-caller-identity --output text --query Account`.dkr.ecr.`aws configure get region`.amazonaws.com/`head -n 1 serverless.yml | cut -d':' -f2 | xargs`')"):task1
scripts.docker-push: docker push $(node -e "console.log('`aws sts get-caller-identity --output text --query Account`.dkr.ecr.`aws configure get region`.amazonaws.com/`head -n 1 serverless.yml | cut -d':' -f2 | xargs`')"):task1
scripts.docker-deploy: npm run docker-build && npm run docker-tag && npm run docker-push
